channel.title: Foundation Radio
channel.description: Foundation Radio is an innovative radio network that features the best DJs from around the world. With the latest independent music and interviews, Foundation Radio is a forward thinking and cutting edge one stop shop for the Hip Hop fan!
channel.itunes:author: Foundation Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: Foundation Radio - A radio network for the Hip Hop fan - DJs, MCs, Producers, Interviews
channel.itunes:summary: Foundation Radio is an innovative radio network that features the best DJs from around the world. With the latest independent music and interviews, Foundation Radio is a forward thinking and cutting edge one stop shop for the Hip Hop fan!
channel.itunes:keywords: hip-hop, urban, music, radio, indie, hip hop, hip, hop

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Reflection Eternal - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore
item.description: On May 10, 2010, Talib Kweli and Hi-Tek, collectively known as Reflection Eternal, came through Sound Session to talk with DJ Hyphen. They ran through their entire new Revolutions Per Minute album, giving a detailed breakdown of every track. Listen to snippets of the full interview here!
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Foundation Radio Presents: Reflection Eternal - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: DJ Protege - Foundation Media First Quarter 2010 Mixtape Sampler
item.description: New mix from Austin TX based DJ Protege highligting Foundation Media's projects from late 2009 and early 2010. Features new music from Shaun Boothe f/ Talib Kweli, Nefew f/ Consequence, Reflection Eternal f/ Mos Def and Jay Electronica, Vinnie Paz f/ The Clipse and more! Download and spread the word. Foundation Media and DJ Protege bringing the heat!!!

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: J. Cole - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore
item.description: When Jay-Z was looking to launch his Roc Nation label, the first signing he made was none other than North Carolina's own, J. Cole. While in Seattle for the Blueprint 3 tour on 10-17-09, Jermaine came through Sound Session to chop it up with DJ Hyphen and J. Moore all about his work with Jay, his upcoming debut, his background, and much, much more. Peep the entire interview here!
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Foundation Radio Presents: J. Cole - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: With Royce Da 5'9" - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore
item.description: Soon after Slaughterhouse appeared as a group on Sound Session, Royce Da 5'9" came back to Seattle for a concert on 10-15-09. He also came through the studio to talk with DJ Hyphen all about the Slaughterhouse project, his new "Street Hop" album, his relationship with Eminem, and much, much more. Check out the full interview here!
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Foundation Radio Presents: With Royce Da 5'9" - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Slaughterhouse - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore
item.description: Joe Budden, Joell Ortiz, and Royce Da 5'9" came through Sound Session on 8-14-09 to talk with DJ Hyphen and J. Moore all about their Slaughterhouse project. While Crooked I was in another studio recording a verse for a Seattle artist, they discussed the differences recording solo vs. as a group, if they felt any competition in the booth, who they'd pick in their own super groups, why real lyricists need to be back on the radio, and more. Check out the full interview here!
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Foundation Radio Presents: Slaughterhouse - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore

Check out the full interview here!

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Pac Div - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore
item.description: Like, Mibbs, and BeYoung, collectively known as Pac Div, came through Sound Session to chop it up with DJ Hyphen. They discussed their Church League Champions mixtape, their digital EP on iTunes, and their upcoming Grown Kid Syndrome major label debut. They also discussed how their basketball game relates to their creative process in the studio, being true Dilla-heads, the L.A. scene, and much more.
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Foundation Radio Presents: Pac Div - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Dust For Eyes - Foundation Project Podcast
item.description: Dust For Eyes hails from Sydney, Australia. He has been producing mixtapes for three years and sends them out as a weekly podcast where he features tracks from various sources including this one, dedicated entirely to Foundation Media's recent projects. Check the new joints from Duo Live, Chubb Rock and Wordsmith, Johnny Polygon, Mekka Don, Dead Prez f/ Styles P, and D.O. More information on his podcast can be found at: http://d4emixtape.mevio.com.
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Exile - Interview with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore
item.description: Exile is more than just a dope producer, he's damn near a musical genius. He came through Sound Session on 3-14-09 to talk with DJ Hyphen and J. Moore all about "Radio," an album crafted entirely out of sounds culled from his home radio. He also discussed the creative process behind the project, his crazy live MPC sets with DJ Day, how his family influenced his music, his upcoming Boy Meets World album with Fashawn, a follow up to Blu's Below The Heavens, and the 2892412931 other projects he's got on his plate. Peep the full interview!
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Operation Lockdown - The Double-J's last radio show on WXJM 88.7 (hour 1)
item.description: Foundation Radio is taking it back with this one! This episode features hour 1 from Foundation Media cofounder Double-J's last radio show at WXJM 88.7 (James Madison University) in May 2000. The entire Operation Lockdown crew including Doujah Raze, PHD Grimm, DJ Bones, Thad Reid, and others were in attendance on this festive night. Double-J holds it down on wheels playing classics from Blackstar, Afu Ra, The Arsonsists, and many more. Classic material!
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Asher Roth - Interview with DJ Hyphen & J.Moore
item.description: Possibly the most buzz-worthy artist in music right now, Asher Roth, took time out from his busy schedule to call in to Sound Session on 3-17-09 to talk with DJ Hyphen and J.Moore. They discussed his upcoming "Asleep In The Bread Aisle" debut, the misrepresentation that "I Love College" brings, his producer and secret weapon, Oren Yorel, why being a white rapper is like being the Highlander, and much more.
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: Foundation Radio Presents: Asher Roth - Interview with DJ Hyphen & J.Moore

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: B.o.B. & Playboy Tre - Interview with DJ Hyphen & J.Moore
item.description: PFresh off being named one of the Top 10 artists to look out for in 2009 by XXL, B.o.B. came through Sound Session on 11-1-08 to talk with DJ Hyphen. He brought along his partner in rhyme, Playboy Tre, as well, and the two talked all about their backgrounds, their ability to write incredible hooks, why their music has to be genuine, and why the industry needs a reality check. Peep the full version of the interview here!
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: Bun B - Interview with DJ Hyphen
item.description: The interviews with hip hop's biggest stars just keep coming! This time DJ Hyphen and J. Moore catch up with the one and only Bun B! Check Bun's new single "That's Gangsta" f/ Sean Kingston during the interview intermission. Total running time: 30:29 (20.9 MB).

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: N.E.R.D. - Interview with DJ Hyphen
item.description: In this edition, Foundation Radio contributor and host of Seattle's KUBE 93 Sunday Sound Sesssion DJ Hyphen chops it up with none other than N.E.R.D. Hyphen, his co-host J Moore and N.E.R.D talk about a variety of topics including the Glow In The Dark tour and the new album Seeing Sounds. Total running time: 15:56 (14.6 MB).
item.itunes:author: Foundation Radio

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: DJ Bunty - Exclusive Foundation Media Mix
item.description: In this edition of Foundation Radio we feature an exclusive mix from DJ Bunty. Hailing from Greenock in the United Kingdom Bunty comes through with 30 minutes of some of the biggest underground Hip Hop records out. With music from CL Smooth, Rakim, Kidz in the Hall, Jean Grae, Doujah Raze and more this is a fresh 30 minutes that you need in your iPod. Check out DJ Bunty at www.myspace.com/djbunty. Total running time: 30:00 (42 MB).

item.title: Foundation Radio Presents: M.O.P. - Interview with The Real Frequency Crew
item.description: Foundation Radio continues with the worldwide flavor as we have another exclusive from Toronto Canada's The Real Frequency Show. Broadcasting from Flow 93.5 in Musiklee Inzane, P-Plus and Arcee chop it up with Brooklyn's legendary group M.O.P. Topics range from their transition from the ROC to G Unit to their current status and even more interesting, what they do with their free time. Check out The Real Frequency Show at www.therealfrequency.com. Total running time: 15:05 (21 MB).
